Nightmare Reflections

Svidrigaïlov wakes in a dark room, shaken.  
His face twisted in horror.  
“What, at five years old?”  

---  

Morning light floods the room.  
“I’ve had a nightmare all night!”  
He rubs his aching bones.  
“Damp jacket, revolver… what now?”  

---  

Sitting at the table, he writes.  
Thoughts swirl as he stares blankly.  
Flies buzz around untouched veal.  
“Catch one… just one!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Svidrigaïlov wakes from a disturbing nightmare, feeling shattered and contemplating his next actions with a revolver and a notebook at hand.
